# Printing memory

Generic usage: `x /[Length][Format] <Address expression>`

> See [this link](https://visualgdb.com/gdbreference/commands/x) for all formats.

Print the content of the memory starting at `0x7fffffffdc48`:

```bash
(gdb) x/24b 0x7fffffffdc48
0x7fffffffdc48: 0x0a  0x00  0x00  0x00  0x14  0x00  0x00  0x00
0x7fffffffdc50: 0x30  0x23  0x5a  0x55  0x55  0x55  0x00  0x00
0x7fffffffdc58: 0x02  0x00  0x00  0x00  0x00  0x00  0x00  0x00
(gdb) x/24h 0x7fffffffdc48
0x7fffffffdc48: 0x000a  0x0000  0x0014  0x0000  0x2330  0x555a  0x5555  0x0000
0x7fffffffdc58: 0x0002  0x0000  0x0000  0x0000  0x0000  0x0000  0x0000  0x0000
0x7fffffffdc68: 0x2460  0x5559  0x5555  0x0000  0xdc80  0xffff  0x7fff  0x0000
(gdb) x/24w 0x7fffffffdc48
0x7fffffffdc48: 0x0000000a  0x00000014  0x555a2330  0x00005555
0x7fffffffdc58: 0x00000002  0x00000000  0x00000000  0x00000000
0x7fffffffdc68: 0x55592460  0x00005555  0xffffdc80  0x00007fff
0x7fffffffdc78: 0x00000001  0x00000000  0xffffdc48  0x00007fff
0x7fffffffdc88: 0x55592460  0x00005555  0xffffdc48  0x00007fff
0x7fffffffdc98: 0x555a2350  0x00005555  0x00000002  0x00000000
(gdb) x/24g 0x7fffffffdc48
0x7fffffffdc48: 0x000000140000000a  0x00005555555a2330
0x7fffffffdc58: 0x0000000000000002  0x0000000000000000
0x7fffffffdc68: 0x0000555555592460  0x00007fffffffdc80
0x7fffffffdc78: 0x0000000000000001  0x00007fffffffdc48
0x7fffffffdc88: 0x0000555555592460  0x00007fffffffdc48
0x7fffffffdc98: 0x00005555555a2350  0x0000000000000002
0x7fffffffdca8: 0x0000000000000000  0x0000555555592460
0x7fffffffdcb8: 0x00007fffffffdcc8  0x0000000000000001
0x7fffffffdcc8: 0x00007fffffffdc4c  0x0000555555592460
0x7fffffffdcd8: 0x00007fffffffdc4c  0x00005555555a6ba0
0x7fffffffdce8: 0x0000000000000003  0x0000000000000003
0x7fffffffdcf8: 0x00005555555a6ba0  0x0000000000000008
```
